properties.name: Babalu
properties.description: Posted by Mmoll 1002 Montana Ave, Santa Monica, CAWe\'ve only had breakfast and desserts here, but this place packs \'em in all the time. Leave room for dessert - you won\'t regret it.

properties.name: Back on the Beach
properties.description: Posted by Mmoll   445 Pacific Coast Hwy, Santa Monica, CAThis place is literally on the beach. There are picnic tables set up in the sand. The food is very good, but the service is slow, so be prepared for a leisurely breakfast.

properties.name: Border Grill
properties.description: Posted by Tanabutler 1445 4th Street, santa monica caBorder Grill is the vibrant setting where Chefs Mary Sue Milliken and Susan Feniger, Food Network’s “Too Hot Tamales”, present the bold foods and flavors of Mexico. The Santa Monica-based restaurant serves upscale, modern Mexican food in a hip, urban cantina with decor as wild and bright as a fiesta. Border Grill has established a new standard for gourmet Mexican fare in Los Angeles and consistently ranks among the L.A. Times’ top restaurants. It has also been named “One of the Best Restaurants in America” by Gourmet.

properties.name: Bubba Gump Shrimp Co.
properties.description: Posted by Mmoll 301 Santa Monica Pier santa monica caThis is a restaurant on the Santa Monica pier. The food is decent, and it has a great view. Come armed with knowledge of "Forrest Gump" because the staff will quiz you.

properties.name: C & O Trattoria
properties.description: Posted by Mmoll 31 Washington Blvd, 90292This is a large restaurant on Venice Beach, just a few minutes from Santa Monica. The food is good, but the atmosphere is even better. About every 30 minutes, the staff and patrons stop what they\'re doing to toast one another and sing "That\'s Amore." Fun place.

properties.name: Cha Cha Chicken
properties.description: Posted by Mmoll 1906 Ocean Ave, Santa Monica, CAExtremely casual and inexpensive. This is an order-at-the-counter place, and all seating is on a patio.

properties.name: Jinky's
properties.description: Posted by Mmoll 1447 Second St, Santa Monica, CAThis place serves general breakfast dishes, with a wide variety of waffles.

properties.name: Kay & Dave's Cantina
properties.description: Posted by Mmoll 262 26TH St Santa Monica CAMexican food in California is different from Tex Mex: less cheese and more vegetables. This is a small place near Santa Monica\'s border with Brentwood. Rosemary gives it two tamales up.

properties.name: Library Alehouse
properties.description: Posted by Mmoll 2911 Main St, Santa Monica, CAThis is our favorite place in Santa Monica. They serve Mexican/Gourmet Burgers & Sandwiches, etc. It is technically a bar with a wide variety of beers, but there is a beautiful patio in the back where we always sit. It doesn\'t feel like a bar; we\'ve seen lots of kids here. Mucho yummies.

properties.name: Omelette Parlor
properties.description: Posted by Mmoll 2732 Main St, Santa Monica, CAAs the name implies, this place has an extensive list of omelettes and other breakfast faire. Good stuff.

properties.name: Spumoni Italian Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Mmoll 713 Montana Ave., Santa Monica, CAThis is a small, casual place in the Montana Avenue shopping district (near our house). They serve the best Italian we\'ve found so far.

properties.name: Urth Caffe
properties.description: Posted by Mmoll  2327 Main St, Santa Monica, CAThis place is on Main St. in Santa Monica, which is a great area. They serve sandwiches, salads, desserts, etc. It can get a little crowded.

properties.name: Wolfgang Puck Express
properties.description: Posted by Mmoll 1315 3RD St Promenade, Santa Monica, CAThis is the best fast food we\'ve found. It is in a food court on the 3rd Street Promenade shopping district, and has a surprisingly nice 2nd story patio for great people watching. It serves pizzas, sandwiches, salads, etc.

properties.name: World Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Mmoll  2820 Main Street, Santa Monica, CAThis is another restaurant on Main St. It has a nice atmosphere and a fantastic patio. However, it is a little on the expensive side.
